name: sourceafis-js
description: Node.js wrapper for SourceAFIS for Java via node-java
author: Yeonjun Lee <yeonfish6040@gmail.com>

scripts.build:java: mvn -q -DskipTests -f sourceafis-java/pom.xml package && mkdir -p target && cp sourceafis-java/target/sourceafis-*.jar target/
scripts.build:classpath: mvn -q -DincludeScope=runtime -f sourceafis-java/pom.xml dependency:build-classpath -Dmdep.outputFile=target/classpath.txt && mvn -q -DincludeScope=runtime -f sourceafis-transparency-java/pom.xml dependency:build-classpath -Dmdep.outputFile=target/classpath.txt && node scripts/merge-classpath.js
scripts.build:transparency: mvn -q -DskipTests -f sourceafis-transparency-java/pom.xml package && mkdir -p target && cp sourceafis-transparency-java/target/sourceafis-transparency-*.jar target/
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:java && npm run build:transparency && npm run build:classpath
